Package main

Class Obstacle

java.lang.Object
main.Obstacle
public class Obstacle
extends java.lang.Object
Obstacle class - Manages and draws obstacles of Crash Course Game.
Version:
- 2/21/22
Author:
- Mariah Bray, Dylan Howard, Thomas Jones

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void drawLog​(java.awt.Graphics view)
    A method to create a log and control the movement for this specific obstacle.
    void drawTrafficCone​(java.awt.Graphics view)
    A method to create a traffic cone and control the movement for this specific obstacle.
    int getCounter()
    A method to obtain the internal count of obstacles the user has passed successfully.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getPoints()
    A method to obtain the Array List of points that represent an obstacle.
    int getX()
    A method to obtain the X position of the obstacle.
    int getY()
    A method to obtain the Y position of the obstacle.
    int looperX​(int l, int p)
    A method to allow obstacle to loop back around once they have gone off-screen
    void move()
    A method to move the obstacle out of the player's range after a crash.
    void setX​(int x)
    A method to set the X position of the obstacle.
    void setY​(int y)
    A method to set the Y position of the obstacle.

  • Method Details

    • setX

      public void setX​(int x)
      A method to set the X position of the obstacle.
      Parameters:
      x - An integer representing the desired X position of the obstacle.

    • setY

      public void setY​(int y)
      A method to set the Y position of the obstacle.
      Parameters:
      y - An integer representing the desired Y position of the obstacle.

    • getX

      public int getX()
      A method to obtain the X position of the obstacle.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the X position of the obstacle.

    • getY

      public int getY()
      A method to obtain the Y position of the obstacle.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the Y position of the obstacle.

    • getCounter

      public int getCounter()
      A method to obtain the internal count of obstacles the user has passed successfully.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the obstacles passed count.

    • move

      public void move()
      A method to move the obstacle out of the player's range after a crash.

    • getPoints

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getPoints()
      A method to obtain the Array List of points that represent an obstacle.
      Returns:
      An Array List of points representing the obstacle

    • drawTrafficCone

      public void drawTrafficCone​(java.awt.Graphics view)
      A method to create a traffic cone and control the movement for this specific obstacle.
      Parameters:
      view - A Graphics type object, this must be the same as the Graphics object used in all classes.

    • drawLog

      public void drawLog​(java.awt.Graphics view)
      A method to create a log and control the movement for this specific obstacle.
      Parameters:
      view - A Graphics type object, this must be the same as the Graphics object used in all classes.

    • looperX

      public int looperX​(int l, int p)
      A method to allow obstacle to loop back around once they have gone off-screen
      Parameters:
      l - An integer representing the obstacles X position on screen.
      p - An integer representing how many pixels the obstacle is to move each loop.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the new X position of the obstacle.
